justification: The Offering ('The Ring is trying to get back to its master') and Interfaces ('The pirate captain wore a tricorn hat and an eye patch') provide no explicit or implicit detail about interactive, computer-generated enhancements or immersive augmentations of a real-world environment. There is no mention of visual, auditory, or haptic augmentation, nor any description of an interactive or virtual experience as requested.
ability: The ability to provide an interactive experience of a real-world environment where the objects that reside in the real world are enhanced by computer-generated perceptual information such as visual, auditory, haptic etc.  environment.
